languages.text: "А слышали про новую жену лорда Гримли?" {n}Собеседники склоняются к пузатому слуге, теряя интерес к старой теме, и вы перестаете что-либо слышать. Похоже, троица окончательно забыла о вашем присутствии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А слышали про новую жену лорда Гримли?" {n}Собеседники склоняются к пузатому слуге, и вы перестаете что-либо слышать. Похоже, троица окончательно забыла о вашем присутствии.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

"Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

"Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，你们听说格雷姆利领主的新婚妻子了吗？”{n}那位大腹便便的仆人的话语，引起了另外两个人的兴趣。三个人靠得更近了，对之前的话题完全失去了兴趣，你也听不到他们的说话声了。看来，这三个人已经完全把你忘在脑后了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，你们听说格雷姆利领主的新婚妻子了吗？”{n}那位大腹便便的仆人的话语，引起了另外两个人的兴趣。三个人靠得更近了，对之前的话题完全失去了兴趣，你也听不到他们的说话声了。看来，这三个人已经完全把你忘在脑后了。{/n}

languages.text: «Ah, ¿os habéis enterado de lo de la nueva esposa de Lord Grimley?». {n}El orondo sirviente ha cautivado la atención de los otros dos. Se inclinan hacia él, perdiendo interés por el anterior tema, y ya no puedes oír lo que dicen. Parece que se han olvidado completamente de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ah, ¿os habéis enterado de lo de la nueva esposa de Lord Grimley?». {n}El orondo sirviente ha cautivado la atención de los otros dos. Se inclinan hacia él, perdiendo interés por el anterior tema, y ya no puedes oír lo que dicen. Parece que se han olvidado completamente de ti.{/n}

languages.text: "Aman, Lord Grimley'nin yeni karısını duydunuz mu?" {n}Göbekli hizmetkâr, diğer ikisinin dikkatini çekmeyi başarıyor. Önceki konuya olan ilgilerini kaybederek iyice ağzına eğildiklerinden artık söyledikleri tek bir kelimeyi bile duyamıyorsun. Görünüşe göre üçlü seni tamamen unutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aman, Lord Grimley'nin yeni karısını duydunuz mu?" {n}Göbekli hizmetkâr, diğer ikisinin dikkatini çekmeyi başarıyor. Önceki konuya olan ilgilerini kaybederek iyice ağzına eğildiklerinden artık söyledikleri tek bir kelimeyi bile duyamıyorsun. Görünüşe göre üçlü seni tamamen unutuyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「あぁ、グリムレイ卿の新妻について聞いたか？」{n}太鼓腹の使用人は他の二人の注目を引く。彼らは体を寄せ合い、さっきの話題に興味を失い、彼らの言っていることが聞こえなくなる。この三人組はあなたのことを完全に忘れているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、グリムレイ卿の新妻について聞いたか？」{n}太鼓腹の使用人は他の二人の注目を引く。彼らは体を寄せ合い、さっきの話題に興味を失い、彼らの言っていることが聞こえなくなる。この三人組はあなたのことを完全に忘れているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: « Oh, vous avez entendu à propos de la nouvelle femme du seigneur Grimley ? » {n}Le serviteur bedonnant a maintenant l'attention des deux autres. Ils ne semblent plus du tout s'intéresser au sujet précédent, et vous n'entendez plus un mot de ce qu'ils disent. On pourrait presque croire que le trio a complètement oublié votre existence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, vous avez entendu à propos de la nouvelle femme du seigneur Grimley ? » {n}Le serviteur bedonnant a maintenant l'attention des deux autres. Ils ne semblent plus du tout s'intéresser au sujet précédent, et vous n'entendez plus un mot de ce qu'ils disent. On pourrait presque croire que le trio a complètement oublié votre existence.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, habt Ihr von Lord Grimleys neuer Frau gehört?" {n}Damit hat der dickbäuchige Diener die Aufmerksamkeit der beiden anderen geweckt. Sie beugen sich zu ihm und verlieren das Interesse am vorherigen Thema. Du verstehst kein Wort mehr von ihrem Gespräch. Offenbar hat das Trio dich vollkommen vergessen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, have you heard about Lord Grimley's new wife?" {n}The pot-bellied servant has the other two's attention now. They lean closer, losing interest in the previous topic, and you can no longer hear a word they're saying. It would appear the trio has forgotten about you completely.{/n}
